description: Magic Carpet Foods serves whole-world vegetarian & vegan delights in University City, Philadelphia. We are family owned and operated, and have been since 1984!Magic Carpet Foods operates two street-side vending carts located in University City, Philadelphia, PA. We are located at the corner of 34th and Walnut & on Spruce between 35th and 36th. The hours vary slightly based on the weather & school schedule, but look for us anytime between 11am and 3pm, Monday thru Friday. New for 2010 - We have a special events truck, located at Great Plaza, in Penn's Landing, which is open during most concerts and festivals.Our mission is to provide unique and delicious vegetarian food to the students & staff of The University of Pennsylvania & Drexel University as well as all the residents of Philadelphia.Whole World Vegetarian Dishes -- a mixture of Middle Eastern, Greek, Indian, and our own creations. You can get baked tofu, humus w/ pita bread, falafel, veggie chili, tofu meatballs, seitan peppersteak, spinach pie, and a varying selection of soups, salads, and sweet treats. Everything is piping hot and made to order.
name: Magic Carpet Foods
